2000000000000000000000

ERC20._mint(recipient, Uint256(2000000000000000000000, 0));

protostar declare ./build/ex01.json --network testnet --account-address 0x052E6AD8187767eF41F2F3bc225D33d31B37DD9BBEE7B628F4b6b16b90D293EC --max-fee auto --private-key-path ./.env

python3 -i utils.py
